content: @Benedikt Peterseim will talk this very Wednesday at our usual time about _ Higher-Order Probability: Probability Monads on Cartesian Closed Categories_ … can’t wait!
Small reminder that this is today. Looking forward to seeing you there!

Recording posted to dropbox!

(If someone could look in on Jean-Baptiste? that last message suggests his power might be running low...)
Robin Cockett was taking my pulse at the end of a hike 5 days ago (and not the contrary) cause I was not far from passing out. So yeah...
Good heavens. What happened? Was this high altitude?

I think I just walked way too fast and it was pretty hot. I was already a bit tired also. I didn't eat much at lunch too.

More generally, everybody was tired at FMCS due to hotness probably, and several people got sick: 5 people had a stomach bug due to a virus in the station (we were in Kananaskis) + we had one case of covid.

This morning I didn't remember that we have a seminar before seeing the message of Benedikt ahah. I've been a bit tired lately. I forgot my computer for FMCS also ahah.

I can handle the administrivia for now, Jean-Baptiste, but we'll need you in the fall for speaker recruitment, so dont get too sick! ... In all seriousness, I hope you are ok, and wish for you that you can take a vacation and a health-checkup. Please don't tire yourself out on anyone else's account.

Benedikt's slides are here and I've added them to dropbox as well.
